title: SASL error
content: Thunderbird couldn't connect to ATT/yahoo mail with the error "Sending of username did not succeed. Mail server inbound.att.net responded: Unsupported SASL mechanism." I am totally unfamiliar with this issue but know it involves an encrypted password. A net search so far is of little help though I did run into a statement that windows doesn't have this issue. I use linux and searching my package manager I find quite a few SASL mechanism plugins (who knew?) but no way to differentiate any. ATT's site is useless. Is anyone here familiar with this problem? In the meantime, I see 1 called login mechanism plugin - no, thats deprecated of course, says use the plain one so its that one for me. Tnx...
creator: jeff-g

title: Cartelle Thunderbird in inglese
content:
Buongiorno, sto utilizzando Thunderbird Mobile sul mio Android e ho configurato 3 mailbox:

@libero.it @live.it @miasocietà.it (per intenderci un indirizzo Microsoft 365)

Libero e Live mostrano cartelle in inglese come Sent, Trash, Deleted etc tranne che per Posta in arrivo. L'unica totalmente in italiano è quella con indirizzo su 365.

Potreste aiutarmi e configurare la cartelle su libero e live in italiano?

Grazie a tutti per il supporto

title: Hyperlinks
content:
Hi

My version of Thunderbird has just been updated automatically to 140.Oesr (32-bit)

I now cannot enter hyperlinks (Ctrl K) into emails.

The text appears in the email but it is not underlined.

I have also sent the emails to myself and the hyperlink is still not clickable in the received email.

I was able to enter hyperlinks in the previous version of Thunderbird.

I hope you have a solution because I use this facility frequently.

Thank you.

Brian

title: Unable to send emails on laptop
content:
I went to use Thunderbird mail on my laptop for the first time in ages. I can receive emails but they won't send:

Log in to server SMTP-mail.outlook.com with username x failed Retry - Enter New Password - Cancel

- I entered the current password, which works fine for Thunderbird Mail on my desktop PC, and checked the box use password manager.

Send Message Error: Sending of the message failed. Unable to authenticate to Outgoing server (SMTP) smtp-mail.outlook.com Please check the password and verify the 'Authentication method' in Account Settings | Outgoing server (SMTP)

Server Type: IMAP Mail Server Server Name: imap-mail.outlook.com I CHANGED THIS to outlook.office365.com - to match the server settings on Thunderbird Mail for my desktop PC - and restarted Thunderbird, but the Log in to server failed message displayed again. Port: 993 Default: 993 Connection security: SSL/TLS Authentication method: OAuth2

I trust I have provided sufficient information for you help me. Thank you!
creator: chattome

title: Email addresses get mangled when importing group addresses from csv
content:
I exported a group email list from Thunderbird, edited the list (primarily by adding new names) saved the result as a csv. When I imported the list, first off I was NOT able to import the list as a separate group within my personal address book which was really annoying. I found another thread at https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1498090 where someone was having the same problem. So it appears there is no easy way to create an new group in Thunderbird under my address book

More importantly, ALL the email addresses I imported were mangled for example k_boreen@hotmail.com became k+AF8-boreen+AEA-hotmail.com

Fortunately, it looks like I still have the old addresses in addition to the ones I imported but it's going to be a pain to get rid of the mangled addresses

I'm on version 128.12.0esr
creator: elizabethsimon

title: Message Filters: triggered information + avoid duplicates
content:
Could you please add the columns "triggered number" and\or "last triggered" to Message Filters > Rules > Match? This would good, for example, to determine which email filters are still useful (so old ones could be removed).

Also, the fields conditions really need a sort or "find duplicate" options to avoid bloating the list with copies.

Thank you
